input: For operation within the allowable operating region (AOR) (refer to ANSI/HI 9.6.3), a minimum margin ratio of 1.1 or a margin of 1.0 m (3.3 ft), whichever is greater, is recommended at each particular rate of flow.

1. Item: operation within the allowable operating region (AOR) (refer to ANSI/HI 9.6.3)
2. Property: minimum margin ratio
3. Value: 1.1 or a margin of 1.0 m (3.3 ft), whichever is greater, is recommended at each particular rate of flow
